channel.title: ..::.. Brutal Pkers ..::.. Coming Soon ..::
channel.description:
Brutal Pkers will be an all-round server. The server is still under development, and due to a busy summer work schedule, things will be slightly delayed within the development. As this server wasn't up for an Easter event, I will hold some sort of easter event when it goes up for some beta testing. We have also got some new items that you will be able to aquire in the easter event. This includes 4 new easter eggs and a lindt bunny.
All shops will be filled during the beta stage and then re-edited after. I will wipe the players after beta has finished.
[b]Note:[/b] If you aquire any of the Easter Event items, take a screenshot and I will reimburse them once beta has finished. If you don't take a screenshot, no reimbursement will be made.
..::.. General Information ..::..
- Max stat is set to 120 - Dragon smithing - Clan system - Gambling minigame - Elite Four minigame - Ability to make Super Magic Potions - No more dragon square drops. You must aquire both halfs and exchange them and 1,000,000 coins with klank and he will assemble them and give you a square - You must complete the herblaw minigame/quest (Druidic Ritual) in order to start using the herblaw skill. - Adventurer is used to teleport you to wilderness locations. - Guild amulet implemented that will teleport you to different guilds. - Teleporting crystal implemented that will teleport you to the different cities. - Super set certificates and prayer potion certificates have been edited and their colour changed - Info tab changed and edited into a commands tab - Rune armour packages added and exchanged in Edgeville for armour - Armoured party hats. This includes: Mith, Addy and Rune. They will give the same stats as larges - Admins and Mods will get a set of armour that will turn them invisible - Dragon pickaxe and hatchet are also useable - Mata Rays, Sea Turtles and Lava Eels are fishable and cookable - Dragonite Essence added for use with the dragon smithing - Information added to the client screen. This includes: Username, Fatigue, Prayer, Combat Level and Coordinates. You can also toggle this on and off with the F6 button - Experience certificates and stat reduction certificates - New Herbs - Dragonstone Amulet teleporting locations changed - Training Area in the Underground Passage
..::.. Elite Four Minigame ..::..
For the elite four minigame, you will need specific stats in order to start it. If you have the required stats, you will then be given the elite four book, which you then read. That will give you a brief explanation of the location of the four elite monsters.
Each elite monster will drop a piece of elite armour (unwieldable as it's for a minigame). Once you have aquired all the pieces of armour, you will then take it back to Oziach.
Once completed, you will be given a random item as a prize. You will also be given the Elite dungeon key, which will be required to enter a new dungeon that is still currently under development. In this area, there will be the rocks to mine dragonite ore and essence. There will also be elite npcs which will drop some new items.
..::.. Current Development ..::..
- Elite Dungeon - Tutorial Island - Runecrafting - Item Upgrade System - New City - Kingdom of Darkness - New Guilds - New Prayers and Spells - NPCs to exchange experience certificates and stat reduction certificates - New Potions
..::.. Commands ..::..
::online ::onlinelist ::stuck (Teleports you back to edgeville bank) ::wipebank (This will delete everything in your bank) ::runes (Gives you 500 of the basic runes for 10,000 coins) ::appearance (Lets you change your appearance without going to the makeover mage. This will require 3,000 coins) ::vials (This will delete all the vials in your inventory) ::noob (This will give you some starter items. This includes full iron, iron 2-handed sword, ruby amulet of strength and a teleporting crystal. After beta has finished, these will be edited) ::say (This sends a message to the whole server. You will [b]not[/b] be able to use this command if you don't have a spirit horn) ::fatigue (This will set your fatigue to 100%) ::brzarrows (This will give you 500 bronze arrows for 5,000 coins) ::irnarrows (This will give you 500 iron arrows for 8,000 coins) ::stlarrows (This will give you 500 steel arrows for 10,000 coins) ::mtharrows (This will give you 500 mithril arrows for 15,000 coins) ::adyarrows (This will give you 500 addy arrows for 20,000 coins) ::runearrows (This will give you 500 rune arrows for 30,000 coins) ::superset (This will give you a super set for 20,000 coins)
..::.. Pictures ..::..
[b]Note:[/b] Some pictures are from early stages of the development, so somethings will have changed when in game.
[img]http://img120.imageshack.us/img120/994/screenshot65.png[/img]

You can get into the underground passage training area by using the lever that is located behind the bank.
[img]http://img256.imageshack.us/img256/4089/screenshot4x.png[/img]
To get back into Edgeville, you can use the lever located in the training area.

..:.. New Picture ..::..
New Ranks and Crowns are being introduced.
[img]http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/7621/screenshot189.png[/img]
Flame away, I don't care. Development is nowhere near finished and when I get the time, a lot more updates will happen.
Link to the forums can be found in my signature.

If it’s still in development, I’m moving it into the dev. section.
